T02TD2601E:68b-1: a'a rya manydzu shr'i mandala bo dhi kri ta /
T02TD2601E:68b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
T02TD2601E:68b-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2601E:68b-5: khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes sku //
T02TD2601E:68b-6: de bzhin nyid dag dri med pa'i //
T02TD2601E:68b-7: tshig la smra mkhas brjod pa'i gsung //
T02TD2601E:68b-8: khyab bdag sku lnga la bstod de //
T02TD2601E:68b-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lam //
T02TD2601E:68b-11: thabs dang shes rab don ldan pa'i //
T02TD2601E:68b-12: dad ldan thos pa la brtson dang //
T02TD2601E:68b-13: dbang thob ngang ba spyin pa'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:68b-14: dben pa'i gnas kyi bar chad bsal //
T02TD2601E:68b-15: byams sems ldan pas bsnyen pa brtsam //
T02TD2601E:68b-16: slob mas thal mo spyar byas nas //
T02TD2601E:68b-17: mandala me tog bcas phul nas //
T02TD2601E:69a-2: lam gyi dam pa ba stan du gsol //
T02TD2601E:69a-3: gsol btab ngang spyin ched du ni //
T02TD2601E:69a-4: rdzas rnams la sogs ngang ba spyin //
T02TD2601E:69a-5: byams ldan bsnyen pa la 'jug bya //
T02TD2601E:69a-6: gtso bo la 'bum gzhan la khri //
T02TD2601E:69a-7: aom badzra t'i kshna du: kha tstshe da /
T02TD2601E:69a-8: pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urtta ye /
T02TD2601E:69a-9: dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa na h'um dh'i:/
T02TD2601E:69a-10: phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma btang //
T02TD2601E:69a-11: bsod nams bsags pas spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2601E:69a-12: sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan byung nas //
T02TD2601E:69a-13: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las brtsam bya //
T02TD2601E:69a-14: dang po sangs rgyas skur gsal la ;
T02TD2601E:69a-15: / lha mnyes sa bslangs brtag dang //
T02TD2601E:69a-16: nags tshal spangs ljongs nyams dga'i gnas //
T02TD2601E:69a-17: sngar byas rang yid dga' bar ba rtsom //
T02TD2601E:69a-18: dri zhim chus gtor me tog dgram //
T02TD2601E:69a-19: de ltar sa brtag de ru ni //
T02TD2601E:69a-20: mchod pa lnga yis lha mo mchod //
T02TD2601E:69a-21: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ;
T02TD2601E:69a-22: / spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis //
T02TD2601E:69a-23: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2601E:69a-24: lha ma khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2601E:69a-25: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2601E:69a-26: bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar //
T02TD2601E:69a-27: de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02TD2601E:69a-28: pham par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2601E:69a-29: lan gsum brjod pas sa la thim //
T02TD2601E:69a-30: de yi rtags ni shar la sogs //
T02TD2601E:69a-31: mthon dman rtags kyis brtag par bya //
T02TD2601E:69a-32: rko ba lto 'phye'i lte bar brko //
T02TD2601E:69a-33: dri yi chu yis spangs la bzhag / de nas lag mthil ltar mnyam bya //
T02TD2601E:69a-34: lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02TD2601E:69a-35: sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam //
T02TD2601E:69a-36: logs dang steng yang de bzhin no //
T02TD2601E:69a-37: bdag ni dkyil 'khor lha mchod pas //
T02TD2601E:69a-38: lha rnams khyed ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2601E:69a-39: bdag gzhan sgrib pa spyang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:69a-40: rin chen sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2601E:69a-41: de nas dbu rgyan stod g-yogs dang //
T02TD2601E:69a-42: rgyan bgos rdo rje dril thogs nas //
T02TD2601E:69a-43: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
T02TD2601E:69a-45: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a: h'um /
T02TD2601E:69a-47: aom badzre nee bi tya a'a: h'um /
T02TD2601E:69a-49: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa //
T02TD2601E:69a-50: sgyu ma sprul pa bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2601E:69a-51: 'ja' tshon lta bur so sor gsal //
T02TD2601E:69b-0: thabs @69b dang shes rab sku mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2601E:69b-2: khong nas 'byung ba shes rab thabs //
T02TD2601E:69b-3: shes rab dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol //
T02TD2601E:69b-4: nyon mongs dug rnams sel mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2601E:69b-5: thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol //
T02TD2601E:69b-6: aom pradzny'a mandala pra be sha ;
T02TD2601E:69b-7: aom au pa mandala pra be sha / de nas phyogs bcu khro bos bsrung //
T02TD2601E:69b-8: bka' bsgo stang stabs bya bar bshad //
T02TD2601E:69b-9: gur dang bla re la sogs pa //
T02TD2601E:69b-10: raksha'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2601E:69b-11: ba yi rnam ldas legs byugs te //
T02TD2601E:69b-12: de steng dri yi theg le dang //
T02TD2601E:69b-13: me tog tshom bu dgram par bya //
T02TD2601E:69b-14: tshogs bsags stong nyid bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2601E:69b-15: bhr'um las gzhal yas aas lha bskyed //
T02TD2601E:69b-16: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug bya //
T02TD2601E:69b-17: 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyed byed yum //
T02TD2601E:69b-18: khong nas 'byung ba skye med bdag / smra bsam brjod med spros bral yum //
T02TD2601E:69b-19: gsang ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-20: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
T02TD2601E:69b-21: gti mug ma lus 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2601E:69b-23: rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-24: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
T02TD2601E:69b-25: zhe sdang ma lus 'joms mdzad cing //
T02TD2601E:69b-26: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //
T02TD2601E:69b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-28: mchod pa chen po nga rgyal che //
T02TD2601E:69b-29: nga rgyal ma lus 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD2601E:69b-30: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'dzin //
T02TD2601E:69b-32: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD2601E:69b-34: sprin dkar dag bzhin padma bsnams //
T02TD2601E:69b-35: snang ba mtha' yas phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-36: mchod pa chen po phrag dog che //
T02TD2601E:69b-37: phrag dog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2601E:69b-38: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
T02TD2601E:69b-39: phyag 'tshal don yod grub la bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-40: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med cing //
T02TD2601E:69b-41: gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
T02TD2601E:69b-42: glegs bam ral gri phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2601E:69b-43: dang po'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:69b-44: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02TD2601E:69b-45: nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
T02TD2601E:69b-46: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
T02TD2601E:70a-1: ye shes sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2601E:70a-2: ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba //
T02TD2601E:70a-3: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
T02TD2601E:70a-4: ye shes sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-5: 'dod pa chen po bde chen ldan //
T02TD2601E:70a-6: dga' ba don ldan mgu bar byed //
T02TD2601E:70a-7: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
T02TD2601E:70a-8: shes rab sems dpa' bcu drug bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-9: spyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo la //
T02TD2601E:70a-10: tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba ma //
T02TD2601E:70a-11: bzod pa'i bdag nyid pi wang ma //
T02TD2601E:70a-12: brtson 'grus bdag nyid gar mkhan ma ;
T02TD2601E:70a-13: / lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-14: shes rab mar me bsam gtan bri //
T02TD2601E:70a-15: thabs ldan me tog smon lam ro //
T02TD2601E:70a-16: phyag 'tshal lha mo bzhi la bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-17: sems can don la rab brtson pa'i //
T02TD2601E:70a-18: snying rje chen po blo mchog ldan //
T02TD2601E:70a-19: byams pa la sogs thabs kyi bdag / thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-20: stobs ldan lcags kyu zhags pa ma //
T02TD2601E:70a-21: ye shes lcags sgrog dril bu ma //
T02TD2601E:70a-22: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2601E:70a-23: sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2601E:70a-24: de nas grub pa'i las brtsams nas //
T02TD2601E:70a-25: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kun //
T02TD2601E:70a-26: ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:70a-27: sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir //
T02TD2601E:70a-29: thal spyar pus btsugs dril bu gsil //
T02TD2601E:70a-30: spos thogs de ltar gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2601E:70a-31: de nas bsgrub pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2601E:70a-32: gsol ba btab pa sngon sod nas ;
T02TD2601E:70a-33: / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la gdeg / nyi zla'i bar du mkha' la gdeg / de nas slob ma gzung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:70a-34: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2601E:70a-35: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:70a-36: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul ba stan pa'i //
T02TD2601E:70a-37: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD2601E:70a-38: / dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2601E:70a-39: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2601E:70a-40: dkon mchog gtso 'khor bcas pa dang //
T02TD2601E:70a-42: bu tshur lam chen 'dir zhugs pa'i //
T02TD2601E:70a-43: bu tshur theg chen rten yin te //
T02TD2601E:70b-0: @70b khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2601E:70b-1: lam 'di la ni brten nas ni //
T02TD2601E:70b-2: 'das dang ma byon da ltar rnams //
T02TD2601E:70b-3: byang chub shing gi gden drung du //
T02TD2601E:70b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob //
T02TD2601E:70b-5: bdud sde dag kyang 'di yis bcom //
T02TD2601E:70b-6: de bas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:70b-7: bu yis lam 'di bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD2601E:70b-8: dkyil 'khor lnga dang dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2601E:70b-9: dus 'di rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2601E:70b-10: dpa' bo dpa' mo slob dpon la //
T02TD2601E:70b-11: dus 'di rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2601E:70b-12: bla med dkon mchog dkyil 'khor lha //
T02TD2601E:70b-13: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:70b-14: bdag dus 'di nas gzung byas te //
T02TD2601E:70b-15: tshangs spyod dam tshig sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:70b-16: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD2601E:70b-17: bla ma slob dpon yi dam lha //
T02TD2601E:70b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2601E:70b-19: dam chos rnams la bdag sdig bshags //
T02TD2601E:70b-20: bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas dang ;
T02TD2601E:70b-22: yon tan yongs su sgrogs rnams la //
T02TD2601E:70b-23: de la bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02TD2601E:70b-24: chos kyi 'khor lob skor ba dang //
T02TD2601E:70b-25: bde gshegs mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs //
T02TD2601E:70b-26: phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam lha //
T02TD2601E:70b-28: / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02TD2601E:70b-29: snying po byang chub mchis par du //
T02TD2601E:70b-30: di ring nyid du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2601E:70b-31: bdag ni ded du gzung du gsol //
T02TD2601E:70b-32: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2601E:70b-33: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed ltar //
T02TD2601E:70b-34: de bzhin sems can phan don du //
T02TD2601E:70b-35: bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do //
T02TD2601E:70b-36: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:70b-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD2601E:70b-38: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2601E:70b-39: rnal 'byor sangs rgyas sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:70b-40: rdo rje rin chen khyad par gyi //
T02TD2601E:70b-41: rdo rje dril bu'i sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:70b-42: thabs dang shes rab bsam pas ni //
T02TD2601E:70b-43: slob dpon nyid du sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:70b-44: rin chen 'dzin pa chen po yi //
T02TD2601E:70b-45: yid du 'ong pa'i dam tshig la //
T02TD2601E:70b-46: nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu //
T02TD2601E:70b-47: spyin pa rnam bzhi spyin par bya //
T02TD2601E:70b-49: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i //
T02TD2601E:70b-50: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa yi /
T02TD2601E:71a-0: @71a * // dam pa'i chos kyi sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:71a-1: phrin las 'dzin pa chen po yi //
T02TD2601E:71a-2: tshul khrims gsum ldan bya ba dang //
T02TD2601E:71a-3: rgya che gzhan gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2601E:71a-4: bdag gis sdom pa gzung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:71a-5: de ltar sdom pa rab bzung nas //
T02TD2601E:71a-6: slob ma bsrung bar rab tu bya //
T02TD2601E:71a-7: 'bru gsum sngags kyis rab bsrungs nas //
T02TD2601E:71a-8: gnas gsum byin brlabs rab brtan nas //
T02TD2601E:71a-9: mchod pas slob ma brtan phyir mchod //
T02TD2601E:71a-10: de nas mandala ba ko tsam //
T02TD2601E:71a-11: bshams nas so shing dor bya ni //
T02TD2601E:71a-13: sor ni bcu gnyis 'bus ma zos //
T02TD2601E:71a-14: dri dang me tog shin tu bcings //
T02TD2601E:71a-15: shar bltas mi g-yo steng du dor //
T02TD2601E:71a-16: bza' zin nas ni mi g-yo dor //
T02TD2601E:71a-17: steng bltas mchog thob phyogs su ni //
T02TD2601E:71a-18: so so'i phrin las mtshams su ni //
T02TD2601E:71a-19: dngos grub tha ma 'og gis 'og / de nas dri ma dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:71a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra ;
T02TD2601E:71a-21: mah'a pa tsa bi sho dha sarba p'a pam r'u pa tsitta b'ak aa pa ya na h'um /
T02TD2601E:71a-22: bzlas pa'i chu yis lus ngag yid //
T02TD2601E:71a-23: so sor dag phyir hub gsum btung //
T02TD2601E:71a-24: de nas rgyud ni sbyong ba'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:71a-25: dad dang mi lus thob pa dang //
T02TD2601E:71a-26: sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon //
T02TD2601E:71a-27: me tog au dumw'a ra bzhin //
T02TD2601E:71a-28: lam bzang rnyed pa de bas kyang //
T02TD2601E:71a-29: shin tu sdig pa zad byed pa //
T02TD2601E:71a-30: dkyil 'khor dbang ni thob par dka'o //
T02TD2601E:71a-31: dbang ldan nus pa thob dka'o //
T02TD2601E:71a-32: de nas aom a'a:h'um ma ni bi shuddha h'um /
T02TD2601E:71a-33: sarba p'a pam bi shuddha h'um /
T02TD2601E:71a-34: ku sha byin brlabs sngags su gzhug / ldang ba'i stobs kyis smon lam gdab //
T02TD2601E:71a-36: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um phat /
T02TD2601E:71a-37: gnyis kyis bsrung ba'i skud pa bya //
T02TD2601E:71a-38: byin brlabs srog gnas nyid du gdags //
T02TD2601E:71a-39: de nas gtor ma gtang byas nas //
T02TD2601E:71a-40: slob ma seng ge'i nyal thabs nyal //
T02TD2601E:71a-41: rmi lam rtags ni so sor brtag / rtags bzang spro ba ngan na ni //
T02TD2601E:71a-42: spyin sreg gzhan gyis sdig pa sbyong //
T02TD2601E:71a-43: slob dpon dkyil 'khor nang zhugs te //
T02TD2601E:71a-44: slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2601E:71a-45: de nas rin chen lnga las byas //
T02TD2601E:71a-46: bum pa kha dog dkar po ste //
T02TD2601E:71a-47: pad steng so so'i mtshan ma dgod //
T02TD2601E:71a-48: mgul chings kha dog so sor bcings //
T02TD2601E:71a-49: 'bru dang rin chen lnga dang ni //
T02TD2601E:71b-0: snying po lnga dang spos lnga @71b blugs ;
T02TD2601E:71b-1: /'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan shing //
T02TD2601E:71b-2: sbyangs nas de nas dgram par bya //
T02TD2601E:71b-3: lha grangs mthun pa'i bum pa dgram //
T02TD2601E:71b-4: bi shuddha yi sngags kyis sbyangs //
T02TD2601E:71b-5: brum las rin chen bum pa bskyed //
T02TD2601E:71b-6: nang du so so'i lha rnams bsam //
T02TD2601E:71b-7: dgug gzhug la sogs rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2601E:71b-8: mchod nas bstod cing 'dud kyis bstod //
T02TD2601E:71b-10: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:71b-13: bha ga b'an dzny'a na m'urtti ra ham buddho buddh'a n'am /
T02TD2601E:71b-16: sarba dharm'a ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2601E:71b-17: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02TD2601E:71b-20: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ya a'a:h'um /
T02TD2601E:71b-21: aom b'a g'i shva ra a'a:h'um /
T02TD2601E:71b-22: aom dzny'a na k'a ya a'a:h'um /
T02TD2601E:71b-23: aom aa ra pa tsa na a'a:h'um:/
T02TD2601E:71b-24: zhes pas ni rigs so so dang tha mas ni las thams cad pa'i bum pa byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2601E:71b-25: de ltar bsgrub pa'i dus su mandala byas la /
T02TD2601E:71b-26: me tog go rims so sor dgram //
T02TD2601E:71b-27: mar me mchod pa so so'i grangs //
T02TD2601E:71b-28: zin nas ras kyi steng du gzhag / de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te //
T02TD2601E:71b-29: dang por thig gi las bya'o //
T02TD2601E:71b-30: sar pa tshad dang mtshan nyid ldan //
T02TD2601E:71b-31: dri zhim chu dang snod du gzhag / bdag nyid shar du 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2601E:71b-32: thig ni ye shes lnga ru bskyed //
T02TD2601E:71b-33: phyogs bcu'i ye shes bkug nas bstim //
T02TD2601E:71b-34: aom aa ra pa tsa na ma ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2601E:71b-35: zhes brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas so //
T02TD2601E:71b-36: de nas aom a'a:h'um zhes pas sum sgril du bya'o //
T02TD2601E:71b-37: de nas slob mas blangs la dang po mkha' thig gdab bo //
T02TD2601E:71b-38: sa yi thig gdab slob dpon nub //
T02TD2601E:71b-39: slob ma shar 'dug tshangs thig gdab //
T02TD2601E:71b-40: slob ma lhor 'dug slob dpon byang //
T02TD2601E:71b-41: slob dpon shar lho lho nub ste //
T02TD2601E:71b-42: de bzhin logs thig gdab par bya //
T02TD2601E:71b-43: zur thig de nas cha chen gdab //
T02TD2601E:71b-44: de nas cha chung bcu drug gdab //
T02TD2601E:71b-45: de nas phyi dang nang du dbye //
T02TD2601E:71b-46: nang du bcu drug de bzhin dbye //
T02TD2601E:71b-47: phyi dang de bzhin cha yis dbye //
T02TD2601E:71b-48: cha rnams dbye ba sgo rgyan te //
T02TD2601E:71b-49: nang gi phyed cha pho brang sti //
T02TD2601E:71b-50: tshom bu lnga ldan pad 'dab bzhi //
T02TD2601E:71b-51: de ltar thig ni so sor gdab //
T02TD2601E:71b-52: ye shes skud pa mchod pa ni //
T02TD2601E:71b-53: ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu //
T02TD2601E:71b-54: de nas rdul tshon dgye ba ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-2: yang na 'bras kyi phye mas bri //
T02TD2601E:72a-3: kha dog so sor dgram nas ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-4: aom h'um sv'a aam h'a ga rnams su //
T02TD2601E:72a-5: ma dag bshig nas dag pa bskyed //
T02TD2601E:72a-6: ye shes lnga ni spyan drangs bstims //
T02TD2601E:72a-7: aom aa ra pa tsa na sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2601E:72a-8: zhes lan bdun bzlas nas ni ;
T02TD2601E:72a-9: de nas tshon rtsi rim bzhin du //
T02TD2601E:72a-10: dbus nas brtsams te bri bar bya //
T02TD2601E:72a-11: sgo ni shar nas dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2601E:72a-12: dang po'i tshon la mchod pa ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-13: yid kyis mchod nas tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2601E:72a-14: chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag la //
T02TD2601E:72a-15: sems can yongs dag zhing 'dir bri //
T02TD2601E:72a-16: nyes pa'i dri ma kun bral phyir //
T02TD2601E:72a-17: rdul tshon ye shes lnga yis bri //
T02TD2601E:72a-18: dang po dbus su padma ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-19: sna tshogs shin tu ze 'bru dkar //
T02TD2601E:72a-20: shar gyi sna tshogs ze 'bru mthing //
T02TD2601E:72a-21: lho yi sna tshogs ze 'bru ser //
T02TD2601E:72a-22: nub tu sna tshogs ze 'bru dmar //
T02TD2601E:72a-23: byang du sna tshogs ze 'bru ljang //
T02TD2601E:72a-24: rdo rje'i gdung dang 'dra ba bskor //
T02TD2601E:72a-25: padma nyi mas rab tu bskor //
T02TD2601E:72a-26: de ni nang gi pho brang ngo //
T02TD2601E:72a-27: gru chad ljang la sgo bzhi dang //
T02TD2601E:72a-28: rta babs la sogs bcas pa'o //
T02TD2601E:72a-29: de yi phyi rol cha chen gcig / rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2601E:72a-30: shar mthing lho ser nub dmar po //
T02TD2601E:72a-31: byang ljang gru chad ljang gu ste //
T02TD2601E:72a-32: sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan pa'i //
T02TD2601E:72a-33: dkyil 'khor legs par rab tu bri //
T02TD2601E:72a-34: nam mkha' dang bsre thugs mtshan dgod //
T02TD2601E:72a-35: dbus su sa bon aa bris nas //
T02TD2601E:72a-36: phyogs bzhi gzhan gyi don bzhin no //
T02TD2601E:72a-38: rdo rje rin chen padma rgya gram dang //
T02TD2601E:72a-39: gtso bos phyed nas mtshan ma so sor sbas //
T02TD2601E:72a-40: shar gyi padma 'dab ma bzhi po la //
T02TD2601E:72a-41: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol dgod //
T02TD2601E:72a-42: lho yi padma 'dab ma bzhi po la //
T02TD2601E:72a-43: rin chen nyi me tog dang so phreng dgod //
T02TD2601E:72a-44: nub kyi padma 'dab ma bzhi po la //
T02TD2601E:72a-45: padma 'khor lo ral gri lce dgod do //
T02TD2601E:72a-46: byang gi padma 'dab ma bzhi po la //
T02TD2601E:72a-47: rgya gram mche ba go cha khu tshur dgod //
T02TD2601E:72a-48: gru chad bzhi la nang gi lha mo ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-49: me long phreng ba pi wang chags shing dgod //
T02TD2601E:72a-50: de ni nang gi mtshan ma dgod pa'o //
T02TD2601E:72a-51: de nas phyi yi mtshan ma dgod pa ni //
T02TD2601E:72a-52: shar du gundhe autpala spos phor rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD2601E:72b-0: lho ni rin chen 'bar ba spos @72b phor bu ste'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-1: nub tu padma lcags kyu ral gri bri pa'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-2: byang du zla ba lcags kyu ral gri rin chen sgrom //
T02TD2601E:72b-3: phyi yi lha mo dgod pa ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-4: me tog mar me dri dang bshos //
T02TD2601E:72b-5: de dag go rims so sor ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-6: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-7: lha rnams phyogs skyong rnams kyang dgod //
T02TD2601E:72b-8: ye shes gnyis mad bsres la dgod //
T02TD2601E:72b-9: de nas bla re ba dan sogs //
T02TD2601E:72b-10: bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs dgram //
T02TD2601E:72b-11: de nas rol mos bum pa ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-12: spyan drang bskor byas dgram par bya //
T02TD2601E:72b-13: de nas bdag nyid shar bltas te //
T02TD2601E:72b-14: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug nas ;
T02TD2601E:72b-15: / bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad nas ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-16: rten la mchod dang sdig bshags dang //
T02TD2601E:72b-17: byang chub tu bdag sems bskyed bya //
T02TD2601E:72b-18: stong nyid sngags kyis stong nyid bsgom //
T02TD2601E:72b-19: de nas h'um las rdo rje bsgom //
T02TD2601E:72b-20: khro zhal drug ldan bum par ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-21: brum las chos sku nam mkhar ldan //
T02TD2601E:72b-22: gru gsum nam mkhar brum bsams nas //
T02TD2601E:72b-23: gru bzhi sgo bzhi tshom bu bzhi //
T02TD2601E:72b-24: thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed //
T02TD2601E:72b-25: de nas tshom bu lnga la ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-26: seng ge glang chen rta dang ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-27: rma bya shang shang aa las bskyed //
T02TD2601E:72b-28: padma'i steng du rang sems aa //
T02TD2601E:72b-29: de las rnam par snang mdzad ni ;
T02TD2601E:72b-30: / zhi ba mdog dkar zhal bzhi ba //
T02TD2601E:72b-31: phyag rgya byang chub mchog gi sku'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-32: thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2601E:72b-33: shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ste //
T02TD2601E:72b-34: de steng ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-35: phyag rgyas ral gri pu sti ste //
T02TD2601E:72b-36: gzhan ni so so'i phyag mtshan no //
T02TD2601E:72b-37: mthing ka ser po dmar dang ljang //
T02TD2601E:72b-38: rdo rje rin chen padma las //
T02TD2601E:72b-39: sa gnon mchog spyin ting 'dzin skyabs spyin te //
T02TD2601E:72b-40: de bzhin yum kyi mdog dang phyag mtshan so so'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-41: mthing ga ser po ma rgad ljang gu ste //
T02TD2601E:72b-42: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol ni //
T02TD2601E:72b-43: so so'i phyag mtshan legs par bsnams ba'o ;
T02TD2601E:72b-44: / sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs pa'o //
T02TD2601E:72b-45: gser mdog dmar dang ljang gu mthon ka'i mdog / rin chen nyi me tog dang sor phreng bsnams //
T02TD2601E:72b-46: rin chen nyi me tog dang bzhad pa'i dpal //
T02TD2601E:72b-47: so so'i rgyan ldan sku ni mdzes pa'o //
T02TD2601E:73a-0: dmar dang ljang gu mthing ga gser @73a * //
T02TD2601E:73a-1: bsregs mdog / ma chags sems gcod sems rgyud gsal bar smra //
T02TD2601E:73a-2: kha dog so sor gsal zhing ma 'dres 'dzin //
T02TD2601E:73a-3: padma ral gri 'khor lo lce rnams so //
T02TD2601E:73a-4: ljang gu mthing ga gser bsregs ma rgad mdog / las dang gnod spyin go cha khu tshur dang //
T02TD2601E:73a-5: rgya gram mche ba go cha khu tshur te //
T02TD2601E:73a-6: bzhugs tshul zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs //
T02TD2601E:73a-7: sgeg dang rin chen phreng dang glu ma gar //
T02TD2601E:73a-8: dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang gu dang //
T02TD2601E:73a-9: me long phreng dang pi wang chags shing bsnams //
T02TD2601E:73a-10: pad steng rgyan ldan sgeg pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2601E:73a-11: byams pa 'jam dpal spos kyi glang po tog / dmar po ljang ser mthing ga dkar pa ste //
T02TD2601E:73a-12: gundhe autpala spos phor rin chen tog / so so'i phyag mtshan ma 'dres bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2601E:73a-13: blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad bzang skyong spobs pa brtsegs //
T02TD2601E:73a-14: gser dang gser bsregs aindra n'i la mthon ka chen po'i mdog / rin chen rin chen 'bar ba spos phor bu sti bsnams //
T02TD2601E:73a-15: sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng na bzhugs shing mdzes //
T02TD2601E:73a-16: mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren dang mya ngan dra ba can gyi 'od //
T02TD2601E:73a-17: dmar dang padma r'a ga dung mdog shin tu dkar dang autpala mdog / padma lcags kyu ral gri dra ba bsnams //
T02TD2601E:73a-18: shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan 'dzin sku dang ldan //
T02TD2601E:73a-19: zla 'od gzhon nu thugs rje'i stobs dang nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha'i mdzod //
T02TD2601E:73a-20: zla ba lcags kyu dang ni ral gri 'bar ba rin chen sgrom ni g-yas g-yon 'dzin //
T02TD2601E:73a-21: dkar ser dkar dang ljang gu mthing ka'i mdog / sku mdog shin tu gsal bas ma 'dres gsal //
T02TD2601E:73a-22: bdug pa me tog dri dang ro //
T02TD2601E:73a-23: mthing ka dkar dang dmar po ljang //
T02TD2601E:73a-24: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02TD2601E:73a-25: mthing ka ser dmar ljang gu'o //
T02TD2601E:73a-26: de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed nas //
T02TD2601E:73a-27: thugs kar mtshan ma rab tu gsal ;
T02TD2601E:73a-28: / pra kri ti pa ri shuddha sarba dharm'a ya du ta sarba ta th'a ga t'a dzny'a na k'a ya /
T02TD2601E:73a-29: manydzu shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a mu p'a d'a ye ta aa /
T02TD2601E:73a-30: yongs su dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2601E:73a-31: zhing nas ma lus spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2601E:73a-32: dkyil 'khor rim bzhin ye shes rim bzhin du spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2601E:73a-33: sthi to hri di dzny'a na m'urtti ra ham buddho buddh'a n'am /
T02TD2601E:73b-0: @73b trya dhva wartti n'am zhes pas sku ba zhi la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2601E:73b-1: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:sa bstim zhing byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD2601E:73b-3: da ni dbang bskur te gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02TD2601E:73b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:73b-7: ga ga na aa m'a la su pa ri shuddha dharm'a dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02TD2601E:73b-9: de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni //
T02TD2601E:73b-10: ras kyis gdong ni bkab nas su //
T02TD2601E:73b-11: las kyi rdo rje lam ba stan nas //
T02TD2601E:73b-12: shar sgor slob ma 'dug stangs ni //
T02TD2601E:73b-13: thal sbyor gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug / de nas gsol ba gdab bya ste //
T02TD2601E:73b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
T02TD2601E:73b-15: slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2601E:73b-17: bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2601E:73b-18: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2601E:73b-21: de nas slob dpon gyis gsol ba ni /
T02TD2601E:73b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2601E:73b-23: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2601E:73b-24: bdag gis khyod ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-25: snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba stan par bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-26: gong gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byed du gzhug / de nas sdom pa'i cho ga spyin pa ni //
T02TD2601E:73b-27: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum //
T02TD2601E:73b-28: gsum la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi //
T02TD2601E:73b-30: sdom pa rtag tu gzung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-31: thabs ni rdo rje shes rab dril //
T02TD2601E:73b-32: thabs dang shes rab sdom pa gzung //
T02TD2601E:73b-33: de ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchog / sdom pa de ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-34: nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu //
T02TD2601E:73b-35: spyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu spyin //
T02TD2601E:73b-36: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2601E:73b-37: sdom pa rtag tu gzung ba'o //
T02TD2601E:73b-38: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2601E:73b-39: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung //
T02TD2601E:73b-40: padma'i rigs mchog chen po ste //
T02TD2601E:73b-41: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba gzung //
T02TD2601E:73b-42: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa dang //
T02TD2601E:73b-43: mchod spyin las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-44: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2601E:73b-45: sdom pa dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-46: da ni khyod kyis 'di gyis shig / las rnams su la smra mi bya //
T02TD2601E:73b-47: 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2601E:74a-0: @74a * // aom aa mri ta h'um h'um h'um panytsa hri /
T02TD2601E:74a-1: zhes pas lan gsum spyin no //
T02TD2601E:74a-2: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo slob dpon nus pa dang ldan pas slob ma nyid la bstims nas bsrung /
T02TD2601E:74a-3: phrin las rnam bzhi'i kha dog brtag / sthi to hri di dzny'a na m'urtti aa /
T02TD2601E:74a-4: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs de nas me tog dor byas nas //
T02TD2601E:74a-5: spyan ni legs par dbye bar bya //
T02TD2601E:74a-6: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po ltar //
T02TD2601E:74a-7: de bzhin du ni spyan dbye'o //
T02TD2601E:74a-8: aom aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha badzra tsakshu aa a'a aam aa:bstod pa bzhin spyan dbye'o //
T02TD2601E:74a-9: gdong g-yogs phud la 'di skad do //
T02TD2601E:74a-11: da ni dang ba rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2601E:74a-12: sdig pa thams cad zhi ba dang //
T02TD2601E:74a-14: de phyir 'di la nan tan gyis //
T02TD2601E:74a-15: dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags bsgrub byos //
T02TD2601E:74a-17: rang gi gu hya na ma dang //
T02TD2601E:74a-18: yi dam lha rnams gsal bar ba stan ;
T02TD2601E:74a-19: / lha rnams phung po khams su bshad //
T02TD2601E:74a-20: de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad //
T02TD2601E:74a-21: gru bzhi tshad med bzhi dang ni //
T02TD2601E:74a-22: sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi //
T02TD2601E:74a-23: rta babs yang dag spong ba bzhi //
T02TD2601E:74a-24: dra ba dra ba phyed pa yang ;
T02TD2601E:74a-25: / yang dag spong ba bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2601E:74a-26: ka ba brgyang ni 'phags lam brgyang //
T02TD2601E:74a-27: tshom bu lnga ldan pha rol phyin //
T02TD2601E:74a-28: rdo rje'i gdung ni shes rab bo //
T02TD2601E:74a-30: stong pa bcu drug phyi yang ngo //
T02TD2601E:74a-31: de nas mandala byas nas ni //
T02TD2601E:74a-32: yo byad rdzas kyis bla ma mchod //
T02TD2601E:74a-33: de rjes dbang ni rab bskur phyir //
T02TD2601E:74a-34: sgo lhor sna tshogs padma'i steng //
T02TD2601E:74a-35: slob ma blo ldan de steng gzhag / bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas //
T02TD2601E:74a-36: las kyi khro bo'i sprul pa spro //
T02TD2601E:74a-37: bdud rtsi chu yis bsrung bar gtor //
T02TD2601E:74a-38: aom ya m'anta ka h'um kham /
T02TD2601E:74a-39: aom k'a la r'u pa h'um hr'i:/
T02TD2601E:74a-40: bar chod bgegs rnams bsal nas ni //
T02TD2601E:74a-41: dra ba gur gyis bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2601E:74a-42: khro bo drug gis bsrung ba la //
T02TD2601E:74a-43: rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2601E:74a-44: bum pa'i chu rnams thams cad kun //
T02TD2601E:74a-45: gtso bo'i bum par kun bsdus nas //
T02TD2601E:74a-46: bdag nyid lha yi skur gsal bas //
T02TD2601E:74a-47: slob ma byin brlab bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:74a-48: de nas bum pa blang nas ni //
T02TD2601E:74b-0: slob ma'i mgo la rab @74b gtugs te //
T02TD2601E:74b-1: aom aa bhi shinytsa mam h'um /
T02TD2601E:74b-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2601E:74b-3: dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la //
T02TD2601E:74b-4: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2601E:74b-5: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2601E:74b-8: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gyis ;
T02TD2601E:74b-9: / so so yang dag rab gsal phyir //
T02TD2601E:74b-10: bstims nas mchod cing bstod nas ni //
T02TD2601E:74b-11: mnyam nyid gzung 'dzin spang pas bskur //
T02TD2601E:74b-12: aom b'a g'i shva ra tr'am /
T02TD2601E:74b-13: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD2601E:74b-14: ye shes lnga ldan log lta 'joms //
T02TD2601E:74b-15: stong nyid don ston rdo rje che //
T02TD2601E:74b-16: bu khyod thugs la gnas par gyis //
T02TD2601E:74b-18: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med don //
T02TD2601E:74b-20: mchod cing bstims nas dbang bskur phyir //
T02TD2601E:74b-21: di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2601E:74b-22: aom dzny'a na k'a ya ha /
T02TD2601E:74b-23: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i ;
T02TD2601E:74b-24: / shes rab ye shes gnyis med mtshan //
T02TD2601E:74b-25: pu sti glegs bam mchod nas bstim //
T02TD2601E:74b-26: di ring bu khyod ming dbang bskur //
T02TD2601E:74b-27: aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urtta ye aom /
T02TD2601E:74b-28: ye shes lnga ldan drug rdzogs pa //
T02TD2601E:74b-29: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / spyod lam rgyud du phreng ba'i dbang //
T02TD2601E:74b-30: di ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2601E:74b-31: aom aa ra pa tsa na h'um //
T02TD2601E:74b-32: nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcod pa dang //
T02TD2601E:74b-33: shes bya ma rig bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:74b-34: shes rab mtshon chen ral gri 'di //
T02TD2601E:74b-35: bu yis rtag tu gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2601E:74b-36: aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urtta ye /
T02TD2601E:74b-38: du:kha tstshe da dha ra h'um /
T02TD2601E:74b-39: lha rnams mchod dang sems can mnyes //
T02TD2601E:74b-40: zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD2601E:74b-41: las rnams thams cad khyod kyis gyis //
T02TD2601E:74b-42: bsam pa bzang pos de gyis shig / de nas da ni bdag gis ni //
T02TD2601E:74b-43: ri dvags rna ba bzhin du gos //
T02TD2601E:74b-44: gyon nas khyod la lung ba stan gyis //
T02TD2601E:74b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yi //
T02TD2601E:74b-46: dngos grub rnam gnyis thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:74b-47: 'gro drug dug rnams gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD2601E:74b-49: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya bhur bhu ba sva:h'um /
T02TD2601E:74b-50: chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan //
T02TD2601E:74b-51: chos kyi gandi sgra bo che //
T02TD2601E:74b-52: phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga sgra sgrogs //
T02TD2601E:75a-1: kyis bskyab phyir gdugs phub bo //
T02TD2601E:75a-2: aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urtta ye /
T02TD2601E:75a-5: aom dzny'a na k'a ya dun du ha /
T02TD2601E:75a-6: aom du:kha tstshe da tsha tram h'um /
T02TD2601E:75a-7: aom b'a g'i shva rar tne tr'am /
T02TD2601E:75a-8: aom aa ra pa tsa na dzny'a nee ka tsakshu bi m'a la h'um /
T02TD2601E:75a-9: de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2601E:75a-10: mchod cing bstod la spyin sreg bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-11: de ltar rdzogs nas gtor ma gtang //
T02TD2601E:75a-12: ye shes gshegs su gsol ba ni //
T02TD2601E:75a-13: sva aarthanytse w'a ba ra aarthanytse wa /
T02TD2601E:75a-14: s'a dhi tam gatstsha mu pa da ye ti aa //
T02TD2601E:75a-15: de ltar gshegs nas mu:zhes brjod //
T02TD2601E:75a-16: dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-17: dkyil 'khor rdul tshon mtha' nas bsdu //
T02TD2601E:75a-18: rab tu gnas par bya ba ni //
T02TD2601E:75a-19: dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-20: de nas sa yi cho ga ni //
T02TD2601E:75a-21: blang dang brtag dang bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2601E:75a-22: spyin zhing byin brlab bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-23: de nas bum pa sta gon bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-24: gser dngul zangs la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2601E:75a-25: sa bon mtshan ma so sor bri //
T02TD2601E:75a-26: sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen blugs //
T02TD2601E:75a-27: 'bras bu dri dang kha rgyan gdags //
T02TD2601E:75a-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:75a-31: bha ga w'an dzny'a na m'urtti /
T02TD2601E:75a-35: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharm'a dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02TD2601E:75a-36: lha rnams bum par gsal bar bskyed //
T02TD2601E:75a-37: sa bon mtshan ma so sor bri //
T02TD2601E:75a-38: mandala du ni go rims dgod //
T02TD2601E:75a-39: rnam rgyal bum pa rdzogs par ro //
T02TD2601E:75a-40: de nas go rims bzhin du gzhag / mandala dri yi thig le bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-41: mchod pa la sogs gzhung bzhin dbul //
T02TD2601E:75a-43: ye shes spyan drang bstims nas ni //
T02TD2601E:75a-44: mchod dang rtsa ba'i bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-45: aom aa ra pa tsa na h'um /
T02TD2601E:75a-46: de nas mkha' la gdeg par bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-47: stan ni spyang ba legs byas nas //
T02TD2601E:75a-48: khrus ni yongs dag rdzogs byas nas //
T02TD2601E:75a-49: yar gyi ngo yi zla ba dang //
T02TD2601E:75a-50: snga dro dri med gtsang ma'i gos //
T02TD2601E:75a-51: gyon pa'i slob dpon thig las bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-52: tshon gyi las kyang rdzogs byas nas //
T02TD2601E:75a-53: bskyed dang mchod dang bstod sogs byas //
T02TD2601E:75a-54: de nas rab tu gnas ba bya //
T02TD2601E:75a-55: thams cad sku gsum dag tu bskyed //
T02TD2601E:75a-56: de nas spyan ni drang bya ste //
T02TD2601E:75a-57: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2601E:75a-58: rang bzhin gnas na bzhugs pa la //
T02TD2601E:75b-0: @75b chos dbyings gnas su gshegs pa ltar //
T02TD2601E:75b-1: 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:75b-2: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2601E:75b-3: 'og min gnas na bzhugs pa las //
T02TD2601E:75b-4: bde ba can du gshegs pa ltar //
T02TD2601E:75b-5: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:75b-6: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2601E:75b-7: dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la //
T02TD2601E:75b-8: sprul pa'i sku ru gshegs pa ltar //
T02TD2601E:75b-9: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2601E:75b-10: aom pra kri ti pa ri shuddha:/
T02TD2601E:75b-13: aom pra kri ta pa ri shuddha sam bo ta dza tu ta /
T02TD2601E:75b-14: aom pra kri ta pa ri shuddha ni m'a na dza tu ta /
T02TD2601E:75b-15: aom sthi to hri di dzny'a na m'urti /
T02TD2601E:75b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ya a'a:h'um /
T02TD2601E:75b-19: zhes bya bas mchod nas de p'a g'i shva ra /
T02TD2601E:75b-21: aa sarba ta th'a ga ta sva bh'a ba bi shuddho //
T02TD2601E:75b-22: badzra tsakshu badzra tsakshu badzra tsakshu aa a'a aam aa:/
T02TD2601E:75b-23: de nas aa sarba ta th'a ga ta hi da ya /
T02TD2601E:75b-25: ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddho //
T02TD2601E:75b-29: aa sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya //
T02TD2601E:75b-32: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2601E:75b-33: ratna dh'a tu p'a g'i shva ra /
T02TD2601E:75b-35: aa sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:75b-38: aa m'a la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2601E:75b-42: aa sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:75b-45: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02TD2601E:75b-47: dzny'a na k'a ya dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02TD2601E:75b-48: aa sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2601E:75b-51: aa ma la su pa ri shuddho /
T02TD2601E:75b-55: bum pa lngas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2601E:75b-56: aom hr'i:k'a la r'u pa h'um /
T02TD2601E:75b-57: zhes bya bas bgegs bskrad la phyag rgya ni lag pa mnyam par spyar zhing bcings pa la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du gzhag rtse mo ltar byas ba ni rdo rje ste sdug bsngal gcad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2601E:75b-58: lag pa mnyam par thal mo spyar nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dang gung mo gnyis rtse mo so sor byas pa ni rin po che ste ngag gi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2601E:76a-0: lag pa thal mo spyar nas phan tshun du bsnol ba la gung mo bsgrengs te tshigs @76a * //
T02TD2601E:76a-1: bcag nas rtse sprad pa ni padma ste rdo rje rnon po'i'o //
T02TD2601E:76a-2: lag pa thal mo mnyam par spyar te gung mo gnyis nang du mnyam par spyar te srin lag gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis phyir bskyed de /
T02TD2601E:76a-3: mthe bong gnyis dang spyar ba ni rdo rje rgya gram ste dzny'a na k'a ya'i'o //
T02TD2601E:76a-4: lag pa rgyab spyar nas sor mo bsnol te mthe bong mthil du spyar ba ni 'khor lo ste pradzny'a dzny'a na'i phyag rgyas bum pa blangs la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2601E:76a-5: de nas 'khor los dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2601E:76a-6: aom badzra satva dzny'a na tsakra h'um /
T02TD2601E:76a-7: de nas dung gis dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2601E:76a-8: aom badzra sham ka dzny'a na satva h'um ;
T02TD2601E:76a-9: de nas gdugs kyis dbang bskur ba ni //
T02TD2601E:76a-10: aom badzra dhva dza tsha tram zhes pas so //
T02TD2601E:76a-11: de nas spyin sreg mchod spyin bya //
T02TD2601E:76a-12: gtor ma btang nas dkyil 'khor bsdu'o //
T02TD2601E:76a-13: bdag gis 'di byas dge bas ni //
T02TD2601E:76a-14: thams cad 'bras bu thob par shog / shar nas lho ru za hor yul du ni //
T02TD2601E:76a-15: zla dang 'od kyis gang ba'i skal ldan la //
T02TD2601E:76a-16: gnyis su med cing sbas pa'i don la mkhas //
T02TD2601E:76a-17: chos kyi dam pa de nyid dpal du byung //
T02TD2601E:76a-18: chos kyi dam pa bzang po'i gdams ngag 'di //
T02TD2601E:76a-19: rin chen lta bur 'grel pa rnam gnyis thos //
T02TD2601E:76a-20: de bsgrubs dngos grub 'bras bu thob gyur nas //
T02TD2601E:76a-21: thams cad bla med gnas su 'dren gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis su med pa spas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2601E:76a-23: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
T02TD2601E:76a-24: lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
